name: Freaked Out
description:
Freaked Out is a comedic and fast-paced game where players try to get through the mundane goals of normal life while avoiding deadly traps and hazards littered around their small suburban home.

Freaked Out offers a hilarious and thrilling experience for players of all ages. Will you make it out alive or become another victim of the house's deadly traps?


System Requirements
Operating System : Windows 10/11
CPU : WIP
RAM : Minimum WIP | Recommended WIP or higher
Storage : 302MB

For any inquiries please email us at dumbwaystodieteam2@gmail.com


This is currently an Alpha build containing only the first two levels of the game. We're aiming to release the next levels with an ending to the game within Q2 of this year. Thanks for your support!
